text: Young Sherlock Holmes is a 1985 American mystery adventure movie directed by Barry Levinson, written by Chris Columbus and based on the characters by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. It stars Nicholas Rowe, Alan Cox, Sophie Ward, Anthony Higgins, Susan Fleetwood and Freddie Jones and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1986. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1985 mystery movies Category:1985 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Barry Levinson Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in England
title: Young Sherlock Holmes
